title: Sunanda Deshapriya arrested for attempting to sabotage Geneva protest
content: Sri Lankans in Europe have staged a massive protest against Geneva conspiracies against the motherland. Sunanda Deshapriya who attempted to sabotage the protest on behalf of the tigers is in Police custody.Srimal Pathiraja reporting from Geneva said that this is considered as a major victory achieved by Sri Lanka. More than 10,000 Sri Lankans have…
